USBDevice.releaseInterface

This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The releaseInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a cliamed interface is released from exclusive access.

Syntax

var promise = USBDevice.releaseInterface(interfaceNumber)

Parameters

interfaceNumber
The device-specific index of the currently-claimed interface.

Return value

A promise.

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
WebUSB
The definition of 'releaseInterface()' in that specification.		 Draft Initial definition.
